thread.title: Microsoft Delivers Another Update for Windows 10 Mail and Calendar Apps
thread.title_full: Microsoft Delivers Another Update for Windows 10 Mail and Calendar Apps - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Delivers Another Update for Windows 10 Mail and Calendar Apps
text: Mail and Calendar must be the apps that have received the biggest number of updates since Windows 10 was released on July 29, and a new version is now waiting in the store for users already running this OS. Just like before, release notes are missing from the download, so in case you were curious to find out what is new in this particular release, you're out of luck. This is actually one of the frustrating decisions that Microsoft has made for small app updates and OS pa... Â»
